infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: ThirdParty needs access to your microphone to record arguments for judging.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ThirdParty needs access to your camera to take victory selfies.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ThirdParty needs access to your photos to upload screenshots of arguments and save victory selfies.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: ThirdParty needs permission to save verdict screenshots and victory selfies to your photo library.

plugins.microphonePermission: ThirdParty needs access to your microphone to record arguments for judging.

plugins.cameraPermission: ThirdParty needs access to your camera to take victory selfies.
plugins.photosPermission: ThirdParty needs access to your photos to upload screenshots of arguments.
Allow ThirdParty to save verdict screenshots and victory selfies to your photos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow ThirdParty to save verdict screenshots and victory selfies to your photos.
